titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller Brothers Fund records, Projects (Grants), RG 3
A Guide to the Rockefeller Brothers Fund records, Projects (Grants), RG 3 FA1589

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-10-22 05:45:00 -0400.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Brothers Fund records, Projects (Grants), RG 3

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) or audiovisual material (audio cassettes, VHS, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in four subgroups. The subgroups and any associated series are representative solely of when the materials were processed by RAC, and do not imply an original order of the records. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains grant records and associated grant administration files.
